Create a pocket-sized handkerchief pillow: Fold the handkerchief into a small square and sew it into a pillow that can fit in your pocket.
Use a handkerchief as a bookmark: Fold the handkerchief in half and use it to keep your place in a book.
Create a handkerchief phone stand: Fold the handkerchief into a small triangle and use it as a phone stand to hold your phone upright while you watch videos or make calls.
Use a handkerchief as a scarf: Fold the handkerchief into a long strip and tie it around your neck to keep yourself warm.
Create a handkerchief pouch: Fold the handkerchief into a small pouch and use it to store small items like keys or a phone charger.
